name: LubricantOperation
title: LubricantOperation
author: Ryman_cn(南宫丿睿)
description:
如果你用液化罐储存了过多的润滑油而无法消耗，增加一些润滑油的配方，尽量不影响平衡性。
支持语言：英语、简体中文

If you store too much lubricating oil in the liquefaction tank and can't consume it, add some lubricating oil formula and try not to affect the balance.
language:en,zh-CN
